description:
Project Overview

The role isÂ within our platform for supporting the collection and processing ofÂ our commercial data/revenue data. The tool that does this isÂ called Affrobot. Largely this data isÂ collected via Web and API scraping and weÂ doÂ this for 583 affiliate accounts weÂ have with our partners. Historically these account scrappers were all written inÂ PHP, weÂ now have aÂ micro service called Convoy that isÂ written inÂ Python. However, not all scrapers have been migrated toÂ Convoy yet. The project isÂ Casino related.

Required skills

  • Proficiency experience inÂ Python (1+Â year ofÂ commercial experience)
  • Knowledge OOP, REST API, HTML, GitHub
  • Commercial experience with Playwright orÂ similar frameworks for browser automation
  • Familiarity with RabbitMQ for message queuing
  • Strong knowledge ofÂ PostgreSQL
  • Experience with cloud services, preferably AWS
  • Competency inÂ Docker
  • Understanding ofÂ CI/CD processes and tools like Git
  • Being comfortable working inÂ Agile environments, utilizing both Scrum and Kanban methodologies
  • Strong internet connection required for remote development onÂ Azure virtual desktops
  • Familiarity with the best practices ofÂ storing and processing sensitive data securely
  • Upper-Intermediate orÂ higher level ofÂ English
  • Confidence working independently onÂ tasks whilst also knowing when toÂ ask for help

Would beÂ aÂ plus

  • Experience with Docker, Airflow, Postman
  • Experience inÂ web scraping orÂ automation and knowledge ofÂ headless browsers

Responsibilities

  • Maintain and enhance existing scrapers
  • Develop new scrapers
  • TriageÂ / refine defects that arise inÂ our data pipelines
  • Work with RabbitMQ and PostgreSQL toÂ manage and process data efficiently
  • Collaborate with the team using Agile methodologies, primarily Scrum and Kanban
  • Maintain and enhance CI/CD toÂ ensure smooth and reliable code deployments

Project Stack

  • Python
  • Playwright
  • RabbitMQ
  • PostgreSQL
  • AWS
  • Docker
  • Airflow
  • Git

Development Processes

  • Scrum for planned/project work
  • Kanban for unplanned work (e.g., ad-hoc scraper fixes)
  • CI/CDÂ is inÂ place

Environment

  • Local development will beÂ done onÂ anÂ Azure remote virtual desktop, requiring aÂ fast internet connection due toÂ the handling ofÂ sensitive company revenue data
  • This remote desktop will include all necessary tools, IDEs, local development environments, etc

title: Python Developer

description:
Team ofÂ UKEESS Software House isÂ currently looking for aÂ Strong Junior DevOps Engineer (with Python) toÂ join our team for aÂ full-time position (remotely inÂ Ukraine orÂ inÂ Lvivâ€™s office).

About the Customer:

Our customer isÂ the worldâ€™s largest DNA network from the USA. With more than 30Â billion digitized global historical records, 130 million family trees, and 18+Â million people inÂ their growing database, our customers help people discover their family stories and gain actionable insights about their health and wellness.

About the Project and Team:

You will join the Science Engineering team working onÂ DNA research projects. This team builds aÂ high-impact feature from scratch. Our team will work onÂ building aÂ DNA-only pedigree showing the relationships between people. WeÂ have more than 1Â trillion DNA relationships inÂ our database, and weÂ will work toÂ get the data into the right places toÂ infer how people are related toÂ each other. WeÂ will build this system with machine learning, data engineering, and smart data storage.

Responsibilities include:

  • Work with various AWS services, create new services using Terraform, configure communication between the services and application
  • Work onÂ and guide microservice REST APIÂ design, communicating and aggregating data from different microservices
  • Working with enterprise tools engineer toÂ deploy the data pipelines
  • Evaluate large datasets, address and resolve reconcilable discrepancies through data analysis, and find opportunities for continuous data improvement.
  • Identify automation opportunities within current analytics processes and work closely with the architecture team toÂ implement the solution.

Required skills:

  • 2+Â years ofÂ professional experience inÂ aÂ DevOps role
  • Good knowledge and commercial experience with the Amazon Web Services ecosystem (IAM, EC2, SQS, SNS, S3, Lambda, Secret Manager)
  • Strong knowledge and commercial experience with Python and Django
  • Strong knowledge and experience with Terraform
  • Commercial experience with Docker and Kubernetes
  • Experience development &Â maintenance ofÂ CI/CD pipelines
  • Commercial experience with relational databases (MySQLÂ is preferable)
  • Experience inÂ data mining, large-scale data acquisition, auditing, transformation, and cleaning, both structured and unstructured data
  • English: Upper-intermediate level atÂ least (both spoken and written)

Strong knowledge orÂ commercial experience with the following technologies will beÂ aÂ plus:

  • Spark and Airflow
  • Nextflow
  • FSx for Lustre

What doÂ weÂ offer our new colleague?

  • Competitive compensation (based onÂ market data but also depending onÂ the technical level ofÂ the candidate)
  • Flexible work schedule
  • 3Â health packages toÂ choose
  • Annual paid vacation and state holiday celebration
  • Free English classes (online)
  • Individual approach toÂ professional growth
  • Lack ofÂ bureaucracy and micromanagement
  • Modern, comfortable office facilities (aÂ barbecue zone, kitchens, lounge rooms, coffee machines, etc.)
  • Foreign business trips
  • On-site parking lot and charge station for Electric Cars
  • Corporate gifts, celebrations, and fun activities
  • Sports activities: ping-pong, soccer, work-out

Suppose you have aÂ passion for solving challenging problems, building scalable, robust systems, love working with the latest technologies inÂ aÂ fast-paced, flexible environment, and are excited atÂ the prospect ofÂ having aÂ significant impact onÂ products with more than 3Â million paying subscribers. InÂ that case, weÂ want toÂ talk toÂ you! ;-)
title: Strong Junior DevOps Engineer (with Python)

description:
Sprinterra invites you toÂ beÂ aÂ part ofÂ our friendly and intelligent team. WeÂ develop various and diverse projects and have expertise inÂ many technologies. WeÂ create environment for growth and development ofÂ your skills and knowledge area.

Job Description:
WeÂ are looking for anÂ experienced Python Developer toÂ join the Fintech project.
Our project isÂ aÂ financial planning platform designed toÂ help businesses manage their budgets and cash flow effectively. This solution allows companies toÂ connect their bank accounts and payment systems, import and categorise transactions, analyse revenue and expense patterns, manage invoices, plan short- and long-term business strategies, consolidate financial data and prepare reporting for banks and other interested parties.
The developer will work closely with our team toÂ design, develop, and maintain scalable and high-performance solutions for the project.
The ideal candidate should have strong Python development skills, experience working with RESTful APIs, and aÂ solid understanding ofÂ cloud environments.

Project Technologies and Tools:

  • Development process isÂ managed inÂ accordance with Agile (Scrum) methodologies.
  • Technologies used: Python/Django forÂ BE and Angular for FE.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain Python-based solutions.
  • Collaborate with the team toÂ ensure seamless integration and optimal performance.
  • Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
  • Participate inÂ code reviews and contribute toÂ aÂ culture ofÂ quality and continuous improvement.
  • Optimize applications for performance and scalability.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues inÂ production environments.

Requirements:

  • 3+Â years experience inÂ Python (preferably Django).
  • Experience working with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP orÂ Azure) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).
  • Solid understanding ofÂ databases (SQL, NoSQL) and data modeling.
  • Experience with version control (Git orÂ Bitbucket) and CI/CDÂ pipelines.
  • Strong communication skills.
  • Good communication level ofÂ English.

title: Middle Python Developer

description:
About the Project
WeÂ are working onÂ anÂ innovative product for anÂ American company, developing aÂ system that analyzes U.S. marketplaces. Our system incorporates aÂ machine learning model based onÂ collected data, which assists brands inÂ formulating market entry strategies byÂ analyzing competitorsâ€™ sales performance.

Role Description
WeÂ are seeking aÂ skilled Python Developer with expertise inÂ web scraping toÂ join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will play aÂ crucial role inÂ gathering and processing data from various online marketplaces toÂ feed into our analytical system.

Key Responsibilities:
â€”Â Develop and maintain efficient, scalable web scraping scripts using Python
â€”Â Implement data extraction techniques toÂ collect relevant information from e-commerce platforms
â€”Â Ensure the quality and integrity ofÂ scraped data
â€”Â Collaborate with data scientists andÂ ML engineers toÂ refine data collection processes
â€”Â Troubleshoot and optimize scraping algorithms for performance and accuracy
â€”Â Stay updated with changes inÂ target websites and adjust scraping methods accordingly

Requirements:

â€”Â Strong proficiency inÂ Python programming

â€”Â Extensive experience with Scrapy orÂ Selenium/ Beautiful Soup

â€”Â Proven ability toÂ interact with private APIs and extract data from client-side rendered websites via XHR requests

â€”Â Expertise inÂ using and managing proxy services (rotating IPs, ensuring access, preventing blocks, etc.) toÂ scrape data without interruptions.

â€”Â Deep understanding ofÂ HTTP requests, including the proper use ofÂ headers, cookies, tokens, and session management toÂ navigate security restrictions.

â€”Â Familiarity with handling anti-scraping measures andÂ IP rotation techniques

â€”Â Knowledge ofÂ HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for parsing web content

â€”Â B2+Â level ofÂ English

â€”Â Excellent problem-solving skills and attention toÂ detail

Preferred Qualifications:
â€”Â Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, orÂ Azure)
â€”Â Knowledge ofÂ data analysis libraries like Pandas
â€”Â Understanding ofÂ machine learning concepts
â€”Â Experience with version control systems (Git)

What WeÂ Offer:
â€”Â Opportunity toÂ work onÂ aÂ cutting-edge project with real-world impact
â€”Â Collaborative and innovative work environment
â€”Â Competitive salary and benefits package
â€”Â Professional growth and learning opportunities

description:
Requirements:

Hard Skills:

  • Highly strongly knowledge ofÂ Python, Django, Flask, REST API
  • Highly strongly knowledge ofÂ PostgreSQL, ORM, SQLAlchemy
  • Knowledge ofÂ Docker (docker, docker-compose)
  • Understanding and experience inÂ Monolithic and Microservice architectures
  • Strong knowledge ofÂ SOLID principles
  • Understanding and experience inÂ UNIX-type systems, especially Ubuntu
  • Knowledge ofÂ deploying back-end services

Will beÂ aÂ huge plus:

  1. Knowledge and experience inÂ Express Node.js backends (Typescript &Â MongoDB)
  2. Experience ofÂ maintaining and monitoring production back-end services

Soft Skills:

  • Strong communication skills: Ability toÂ collaborate effectively with team members.
  • Time management: Capable ofÂ prioritizing tasks and managing time efficiently toÂ meet deadlines.
  • Positive attitude: Friendly and optimistic approach that contributes toÂ aÂ constructive working atmosphere.

WeÂ offer:

  • Competitive salary.
  • Flexible work schedule.
  • Opportunities for professional growth and development.
  • Friendly team environment.

What you willÂ do:

  • Development and maintenance ofÂ the back-end part ofÂ large-scale web applications.
  • Working with RESTful APIs and other web services.
  • Collaboration with front-end developers toÂ integrate user-facing elements.
  • Optimizing applications for maximum speed and scalability.
  • Ensuring data security and protection.
  • Documenting code and systems.

title: Middle Python Engineer (ML project)

description:
Hello, future Rooshmate.

AtÂ Roosh Investment Group weÂ back founders, funders, and forward-thinkers toÂ grow businesses and co-create the technologies that will enrich the world.

Roosh invests inÂ companies focused onÂ capitalization (byÂ Roosh Ventures firm) and profitability (byÂ Roosh X). Weâ€™re aÂ dedicated team ofÂ investors, entrepreneurs and operators. With over 10Â years ofÂ expertise, weÂ act asÂ partners inÂ growing businesses rather than mere financial backers.

Besides, Rooshâ€™s portfolio includes such companies asÂ aÂ deep-tech company ZibraÂ AI, anÂ R&D company Neurons Lab, aÂ multi-product company Reface, the Roosh Circle and AIÂ HOUSE tech communities, and others.

WeÂ are looking for Full Stack Engineer who will develop aÂ platform from scratch and beÂ fully responsible forÂ it. WeÂ need aÂ person, who can react and implement the changes inÂ rapid startup environment. Our engineering team consists ofÂ highly skilled professionals. JoinÂ us building newÂ AI solution from scratch working together with MLÂ team.

You will:

  • participate inÂ decisions regarding application architecture and database design,
  • take responsibility for the development ofÂ the backend and frontend inÂ collaboration with the MLÂ team,
  • improve the existing processes, and architecture, enhance logging, alerting, technical stack,
  • work allocation ofÂ aroundÂ 60% onÂ the Back End andÂ 40% onÂ the Front End,
  • preparing ideas for product development.

About you:

  • 3+Â years ofÂ relevant Full Stack experience,
  • experience ofÂ the web development,
  • experience with AWS(S3, SQS, DocumentDB, EC2, ECS, Lambda),
  • experience with Node.js, TypeScript and frameworks: Nest.js, Fastify, Express,
  • experience with Frontend frameworks and libraries: React, Next.js,
  • experience with NoSQLÂ DBs(MongoDB/CosmosDB/Redis),
  • experience with RBDMS(Postgres/MySQL),
  • experience with containers(Docker, Container services like ECS, Kubernetes),
  • experience with analytics services integration,
  • experience with CI/CD.

AsÂ aÂ Rooshmate, you will have:
â€”Â The coolest team ever
You will join striving and open-minded professionals toÂ share ideas and shape the future.
â€”Â Time-off policy toÂ take your time
Twenty-one days ofÂ vacation, long and short-term sick leaves, compensatory days off, maternity and paternity leaves, and moreÂ â€” everything for you toÂ make upÂ your life according toÂ your needs.
â€”Â Medical insurance
Perfectly packed health care covering dental.
â€”Â Boosting your expertise
Weâ€™re interested inÂ accelerating your growthÂ â€” hence weÂ compensate for your professional development courses and conferences. You will get access toÂ all Roosh educational orÂ business activities, where weÂ engage top-notch experts from diverse areas toÂ master hard and soft skills.
â€”Â Financial support inÂ various life circumstances
WeÂ will support you inÂ joy and sorrow ofÂ this unpredictable life.


Howâ€™s the hiring process going?

Our hiring process isÂ designed toÂ ensure that weÂ are aÂ perfect match. SoÂ beÂ ready toÂ come across:
â€”Â interview with Recruiter: weâ€™ll talk about Roosh and answer all your questions,
â€”Â tech interview: weÂ want toÂ see how you think, bring ideas, and work with info. Then weâ€™ll give you feedback,
â€”Â call with your future Manager: weâ€™ll discuss the role and the project inÂ detail,
â€”Â reference check: during the process, weâ€™ll contact your previous workplaces toÂ hear something even more exciting about you.

Still not sure whether toÂ goÂ for Roosh orÂ not? Check our values toÂ resonate with yours first here. Anyway, thanks for your interest.

Weâ€™ll review yourÂ CV and everything you have sentÂ us within five working days. IfÂ your background meets our needsÂ â€” weâ€™ll set upÂ aÂ call toÂ get toÂ know each other better. Otherwise, weÂ arenâ€™t quite ready toÂ get along with you atÂ this moment. But noÂ worriesÂ â€” our journey has just started, and weâ€™d love toÂ stay inÂ touch asÂ our team grows and more opportunities emerge. WeÂ wish you the best ofÂ luck with your aspiration.
title: Full Stack Engineer (Roosh)

description:
Weâ€™re looking for aÂ talented and passionate Python Developer who will help build and maintain product features.

You will help toÂ implement new features, integrate with third-party systems inÂ aÂ secure and reliable way, troubleshoot and resolve complicated and unique issues, and implement performance improvements.

Project details: Fintech platform, which helps toÂ automate and simplify the bank investment process.

Tech Stack: Python, Django, PostgreSQL, AWS, React.js/Redux, Flutter

Our Team: 2Â Back End devs, 1Â Front End dev, 1Â Flutter dev, QA, Designer, PM.

Responsibilities:
â€”Â following and improving project conventions (architecture approach, code style, best practices)
â€”Â following and suggest improvements for the existing project processes, methodologies and guidelines
â€”Â estimation ofÂ tasks and functionality and fit with own estimates
â€”Â creating and updating project documentation (technical and functional)
â€”Â setup and maintenance ofÂ project environments
â€”Â negotiationÂ / explanation ofÂ technical questions and requirements with the clients
â€”Â participation inÂ technical interview with clients
â€”Â guide, consult and make advices toÂ team members with delivery ofÂ assigned tasks
â€”Â contribute into employees growth byÂ providing tech feedback and setting tech goals
â€”Â conduct project related tech interview for external candidates
â€”Â delivery ofÂ assigned tasks:
â€”Â working closely with other staff, such asÂ project managers, quality engineers, UI/UXÂ designers, business analysts, sales and marketing professionals
â€”Â following company processes (time log, vacation, internal policies, prescribed inÂ InoXoft Guide)
â€”Â investigation ofÂ new technologies
â€”Â continuous update ofÂ technical knowledge and soft skills byÂ attending in-house and external courses, reading manuals and accessing new applications
â€”Â providing feedback toÂ colleagues, managers and company

Requirements:
â€”Â 2,5+ years ofÂ experience with Python and Django.
â€”Â Have experience with ORMs (PostgreSQL).
â€”Â Experience with Clouds (AWS).
â€”Â Experience with Unit Tests
â€”Â Experience with React will beÂ aÂ plus
â€”Â Develop and implement software solutions that meet project requirements and quality standards, using industry best practices and technologies.
â€”Â Proactivity, curiosity, and outside the box thinking.
â€”Â English Upper-intermediate isÂ must.

Benefits:
â€”Â Flexible working hours;
â€”Â 25Â paid days off and 10Â sick/medical leaves;
â€”Â Additional paid days off for personal events like marriage and childbirth;
â€”Â Maternity/Paternity leaves;
â€”Â Medical insurance;
â€”Â Discount program;
â€”Â Self-development budget per year;
â€”Â Referral bonuses;
â€”Â Corporate events and gifts;
â€”Â Learning events and mentorship opportunities;
â€”Â Speaking Clubs;
â€”Â PEÂ accounting and support.
title: Middle Python Software Engineer

description:
Letâ€™s breathe life into great tech ideas! With more than 3Â 000 people globally, Intellias isÂ aÂ company where benchmark technological solutions are born. Join inÂ and take your part inÂ digitalizing the world.

What project weÂ have for you

Extract scenes from the real world allowing top automotive companies toÂ simulate their autonomous driving solutions.

What you will do

  • Participate inÂ the development, and maintenance ofÂ Python applications.
  • Troubleshoot and debug applications toÂ resolve issues.
  • Write clean, efficient, and self-documented code.

  • Participate inÂ code reviews toÂ ensure code quality and maintainability.
  • Work with stakeholders toÂ gather and analyze requirements and provide technical solutions.
  • Monitor application performance and provide optimization recommendations.
  • Stay upÂ toÂ date with the latest technologies and industry trends.

What you need for this

Required skills:

  • 4+Â years ofÂ experience working asÂ aÂ Python Engineer orÂ inÂ aÂ similar role.
  • Strong proficiency inÂ Python programming and knowledge ofÂ object-oriented programming principles.
  • Solid understanding ofÂ algorithms and data structures.
  • Experience with OpenSearchÂ / Elastic Search i.e. Understanding how the indexâ€™s works and how the layer are stitched together, also how toÂ create schemas.
  • Experience inÂ Prompt Engineering toÂ maintain, enhance orÂ modify the prompts used for AWS Bedrock.
  • Proficiency inÂ ETL, protobuf.
  • Experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS).
  • Experience with APIÂ Gateway, Lambdaâ€™s, Step-Functions.
  • Proficiency inÂ version control systems, particularly Git.
  • Knowledge ofÂ Agile methodologies, such asÂ Scrum, and experience working inÂ Agile teams.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability toÂ debug and optimize code.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with the ability toÂ collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

Will beÂ aÂ plus:

  • Experience with HDLive maps, Open Drive, etc.

What itâ€™s like toÂ work atÂ Intellias

AtÂ Intellias, weÂ are committed toÂ being anÂ equal opportunity employer, fostering equity, diversity, and inclusion. WeÂ welcome and celebrate the differences ofÂ all qualified applicants. Join Intellias for aÂ career where your unique perspectives are not only valued but crucial toÂ our success.
title: Strong Middle/Senior Python Engineer

description:
About you:
WeÂ are looking for aÂ Full-Stack Developer with aÂ back-end focus toÂ join anÂ impactful project dedicated toÂ enhancing agriculture inÂ developing countries. This role involves developing aÂ mobile application MVP designed toÂ optimize agricultural practices through innovative data collection and phenotyping methods. You will play aÂ crucial part inÂ designing user-friendly interfaces and robust backend systems, ensuring reliable data handling, storage, and processing within resource-constrained environments.

About project:
This project aims toÂ develop aÂ mobile application MVP that will support agriculture byÂ enabling efficient data collection and real-time analysis. Built specifically for developing countries, the app will utilize innovative phenotyping techniques through smartphone-based imagery toÂ monitor and improve agricultural productivity. ByÂ capturing and processing visual data, the application provides essential insights that help farmers make data-driven decisions, ultimately improving crop yields and resource use.

This solution isÂ tailored for resource-constrained environments, ensuring ease ofÂ use and scalability. The project holds immense potential toÂ create aÂ positive impact onÂ agricultural sustainability inÂ developing regions.


Your area ofÂ responsibility:

  • Develop responsive UIÂ components, ensuring aÂ seamless user experience for farmers and stakeholders;
  • Build and maintain scalable backend systems for effective data collection and processing;
  • Design APIs for integration with various hardware and software components inÂ the agriculture sector;
  • Implement data validation and quality control mechanisms toÂ guarantee data integrity and reliability;
  • Optimize application performance for low-resource environments and conduct thorough testing for scalability and robustness;
  • Conduct regular testing and quality assurance activities toÂ ensure the reliability and robustness ofÂ the software solution.


Skills and requirements:

  • AtÂ least 3+Â years ofÂ proven experience asÂ aÂ Full Stack Developer orÂ inÂ aÂ similar role;
  • Strong experience with Python (3+Â years);
  • Strong experience with JavaScript (3+Â years);
  • Experience inÂ atÂ least one major front-end framework, such asÂ React/Angular/Vue.js;
  • Strong experience with HTML, CSS;
  • Proficiency inÂ API development and integration (Restful API);
  • Strong experience with SQL;
  • Experience inÂ cloud services (Google Cloud Platform, AWS, orÂ Azure);
  • Skilled inÂ end-to-end testing, including unit and integration testing, toÂ ensure software reliability and robustness.


Will beÂ aÂ plus:

  • Experience with GCP (Google Cloud Platform) orÂ aÂ strong willingness toÂ learnÂ it;
  • Knowledge ofÂ machine learning frameworks orÂ computer vision algorithms, especially asÂ they relate toÂ agricultural orÂ environmental data;
  • Familiarity with working inÂ resource-constrained environments, optimizing for efficiency and performance inÂ challenging conditions.

WeÂ offer:

  • Working inÂ aÂ team ofÂ talented and passionate engineers;
  • Opportunity toÂ work with the most trending technologies;
  • Long-term enjoyable cooperation;
  • Personal legal support;
  • Payable vacation and sick days;
  • Competitive salary depending onÂ your own talents;
  • Regular performance &Â career development reviews;
  • Team building events.
title: Full-Stack Developer (Back-end oriented)

description:
DataRobot accelerates the process ofÂ building predictive models toÂ get the most out ofÂ valuable data. WeÂ work hard toÂ create tools that nascent data scientists can use effectively while also exposing the rich detail and control that data science veterans relyÂ on. Our headquarters isÂ inÂ Boston, with offices inÂ Ukraine, Poland, Singapore, and Tokyo. InÂ order toÂ keep upÂ with the demand for new features inÂ DataRobot, weÂ are looking toÂ grow our Backend engineering team with Mid level engineers. The primary responsibilities ofÂ this team include developing and supporting new data science tools, designing and supporting our APIs, and instrumenting DataRobot toÂ integrate with enterpriseÂ IT infrastructure. Our team leverages modern technologies toÂ achieve our goals and innovate onÂ our solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop, test, and support features ofÂ DataRobot.
  • Create and maintain automated unit tests and functional tests.
  • Design infrastructure for new features with the input ofÂ peers.
  • Manage individual projects and milestones with abundant communication ofÂ progress.
  • Seek, give, and receive critical feedback inÂ aÂ constructive manner, including but not limited toÂ code reviews.
  • Engage inÂ engineering on-call escalated support ofÂ services owned byÂ the team
  • Competencies should beÂ atÂ aÂ level where aÂ manager can have high confidence inÂ anÂ engineerâ€™s ability toÂ deliver complex solutions onÂ time onÂ anÂ agreed-upon roadmap and manage technical risks.
  • Should beÂ capable ofÂ working with product management toÂ get requirements and drive technical feedback onÂ complexity/approaches.

Knowledge, Skills &Â Abilities:

  • 3+Â years ofÂ proven experience writing high-quality code inÂ aÂ collaborative environment preferably using Python and/or Go
  • Strong Computer Science fundamentals inÂ object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm design, problem-solving, and complexity analysis.
  • AnÂ understanding ofÂ design for scalability, performance, and reliability.
  • Deep experience with automated testing and test-driven development
  • Demonstrable knowledge ofÂ software architecture for large systems
  • Real-world experience decoupling monolithic software into smaller reusable components
  • Self-motivated and proactive, able toÂ take ownership and deliver results.
  • Ability and willingness toÂ learn about new technologies.
  • Personal drive toÂ get things finished.
  • Effective communication behavior.
  • Fundamental understanding ofÂ Kubernetes and Helm. Experience inÂ building and running software systems onÂ Kubernetes clusters inÂ production
  • Hands-on experience with infrastructure provisioning and configuration using Infrastructure asÂ Code (IaC) principles

Nice toÂ have:

  • Experience with AWS, Azure, and/or Google Cloud platforms
  • CKAD (Certified Kubernetes Application Developer) certification
  • Publicly reviewable contributions toÂ interesting development projects.
  • Experience supporting user-facing code and APIs.
  • Data Science experience
  • Identity and Access Management experience
  • CI/CD pipeline experience
title: Backend Engineer

description:
Kauri One isÂ aÂ software development company that creates Fintech-blockchain projects. WeÂ implement the entire range ofÂ financial instruments for processing fiat and cryptocurrencies inÂ one system. Right now weÂ are looking for aÂ passionate Python Developer with fintech experience toÂ join our team.

Requirements:

  • Hands-on experience inÂ fintech
  • 3+Â years ofÂ experience inÂ Python
  • Django framework strong knowledge
  • Understanding the basics ofÂ asynchronous programs and building aÂ REST API
  • Experience with Fast API
  • Working with Celery (creating tasks, understanding retry, countdown, send mechanisms);
  • SQL/NoSQL
  • Docker, docker-compose, GIT, Unix
  • Skills inÂ written tests: End-to-end, Integration, Unit
  • Analytical thinking toÂ break down complex problems into manageable components
  • Collaboration with other developers, designers, and stakeholders
  • Self-motivation toÂ explore new tools and technologies
  • Intermediate English and strong communication skills.

Will beÂ aÂ plus:

  • Experience inÂ blockchain services integrations.

Responsibilities:

  • Update and improvement ofÂ the existing functionality
  • Create new features from scratch
  • Integrations with various ofÂ payment systems and services
  • Writing tests.
  • Implementation ofÂ innovative blockchain and fintech solutions.
  • Code optimizations inÂ security, high-load, etc.

WeÂ offer:

  • Worthy compensation based onÂ interview

  • Possibility ofÂ relocation toÂ Cyprus

  • Working with aÂ team ofÂ open-minded specialists with aÂ low hierarchy
  • Career development opportunities with professional training programs
  • Flexible working hours for your great work-life balance
  • Performance evaluations every 6Â months
  • Full accounting assistance and support
  • The company isÂ open toÂ innovations and suggestions from the employees.
title: Python Developer (fintech experience)

description:
WeÂ are looking for aÂ dynamic Python AIÂ Engineer (Generative NLP, AIÂ Agents, Prompting) with strong experience inÂ Python APIÂ development. This isÂ anÂ exceptional opportunity for someone passionate about shaping the future ofÂ AI-driven conversational interfaces and eager toÂ work with cutting-edge technologies, including API development and integration ofÂ LLMÂ APIs such asÂ those offered byÂ OpenAI.

AsÂ aÂ Python AIÂ Engineer, your primary mission will beÂ toÂ design, develop, and deployÂ AI solutions that integrate into our existing systems. You will have the chance toÂ work onÂ API development asÂ well asÂ prompt-based and API-based solutions, reflecting our commitment toÂ rapid delivery without compromising onÂ innovation.

About the project:

AÂ stable enterprise product for creating marketing presentations, preparing accompanying materials, and developing sales cycle business assistants for global pharmaceutical companies such asÂ AstraZeneca, Novartis, Pfizer, Veeva etc., and financial institutions like ING and Van Lanschot. Completely our code base, weÂ have been developing itÂ since 2015.

Our services are distributed across multiple Availability Zones, adhering toÂ aÂ service-oriented architecture. Since 2018, weÂ have prioritized GraphQL, although weÂ maintain comprehensive support for RESTful APIs. Our core API services are built onÂ aÂ diverse stack ofÂ programming languages, each chosen toÂ optimize task performance. This stack includes aÂ rapidly evolving Golang Core API, legacy Core API services inÂ PHP (leveraging frameworks like Laravel and Yii2) for established business logic and data layer interactions, Node.js (utilizing both JavaScript and TypeScript), Python APIs, and .NET Core C# components.

WeÂ utilize aÂ hybrid cloud infrastructure, harnessing the strengths ofÂ both AWS and GCP toÂ meet our operational needs, and focus onÂ Serverless. Our work also involves extensive integration with APIÂ partners, including Veeva, Salesforce, and aÂ variety ofÂ others, toÂ ensure aÂ seamless and robust service ecosystem.

AsÂ aÂ product with high-security requirements, weÂ undergo regular penetration testing from auditors and client companies toÂ ensure compliance with industry standards such asÂ OWASP, SOC, and ISO.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and deployÂ AI solutions utilizing Python.
  • Construct and enhance Chains, AIÂ Agents, and AIÂ Pipelines with tools such asÂ Langchain and LlamaIndex.
  • Develop robust APIs leveraging Flask and FastAPIÂ frameworks.
  • Develop solutions using Vector Databases.
  • Gather, clean, and analyze data toÂ uncover patterns and derive insights.
  • Research and apply novelÂ AI techniques and algorithms for continuous improvement.
  • Fine-tune LLMs using both manual and automated feedback mechanisms.
  • Ensure the reliability and optimal performance ofÂ AI services through diligent site reliability engineering.
  • Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams toÂ craft impactfulÂ AI solutions that drive business growth.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelorâ€™s degree inÂ Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, orÂ aÂ closely related field.
  • Prompt engineering skills.
  • High proficiency inÂ atÂ least one ofÂ the following programming languages: Python, TypeScript, Golang, orÂ Rust.
  • Minimum ofÂ 1Â year experience inÂ developing AIÂ solutions, preferably with LLMs.
  • Strong foundation inÂ Python, with atÂ least 1Â year ofÂ experience.
  • Ability toÂ design, develop, and deploy machine learning models.
  • Basic NLP skills, including sentiment analysis, named entity recognition, and part-of-speech tagging.
  • Understanding ofÂ machine learning principles and algorithms.
  • Familiarity withÂ AI frameworks such asÂ TensorFlow, PyTorch, orÂ scikit-learn.

This position offers the chance toÂ beÂ atÂ the forefront ofÂ AIÂ development, working onÂ solutions that leverage the latest advancements inÂ AIÂ technology. IfÂ you are driven byÂ innovation, eager toÂ tackle challenging problems, and ready toÂ make aÂ significant impact, weÂ would love toÂ hear from you.

Benefits:

InÂ addition toÂ aÂ great base salary, weÂ offer:

1) Funding for conferences, co-working spaces, software licenses, and other work-related expenses

2) MacBook ifÂ you require one

3) Mobile devices ifÂ you are involved with mobile development projects

4) Flexible working hours and fully remote working without micromanagement

5) Modern technology stack

6) Time for open source development

7) Bonus atÂ the end ofÂ the year

8) Paid study leave

9) Paid English language courses

10) **36**Â company-paid days off per annum

11) Access toÂ educational streaming services like Pluralsight

12) Input onÂ the development ofÂ the company

Our core values:

WeÂ are open-minded, humble, respectful, self-driven, and honest, which allowsÂ us toÂ create anÂ atmosphere ofÂ synergy. Our team isÂ aÂ great fit for those who value self-organization and are passionate about personal growth. IfÂ this resonates with you, weâ€™d love toÂ have you join the team.

title: Senior Full-stack Engineer (Python+JS)

description:
AtÂ SPDÂ Technology, weÂ bring together aÂ team ofÂ like-minded people who are driven byÂ the desire toÂ bring value through their work, united inÂ their commitment toÂ high performance and delivering custom, cutting-edge tech solutions that drive clientsâ€™ growth. WeÂ empower our people with aÂ culture ofÂ excellence and enable them with the opportunity toÂ uphold their accountability toÂ contribute onÂ each level. WeÂ value humanity and collaboration, encourage professional and personal growth, and foster aÂ supportive and flexible work environment where everyoneâ€™s contribution isÂ welcomed.

WeÂ are seeking aÂ Python/Django Full-Stack Engineer.

About the project

CashStar isÂ aÂ digital gift card platform that allows retailers and businesses toÂ sell and manage eGift cards online. Specializing inÂ mobile and digital gift card services, itÂ offers customizable solutions for brands. InÂ 2017, CashStar was acquired byÂ Blackhawk Network, aÂ global leader inÂ prepaid and payment technologies, toÂ strengthen its presence inÂ the digital gift card market and enhance its eCommerce and mobile solutions portfolio.

Blackhawk Network focuses onÂ issuing, distributing, and managing gift cards, asÂ well asÂ processing payments, exchanging, and refilling them. Additionally, the company handles aÂ variety ofÂ digital content such asÂ eGifts, incentive cards, promotions, and rewards. Blackhawk Network operates multiple e-commerce platforms toÂ distribute gift card products and provides essential services toÂ support the entire gift card ecosystem.

The first project you will beÂ involved inÂ focuses onÂ automating the customer onboarding process.

Youâ€™ll work with the following stack:

Python, Django, Django REST, Django ORM, React, MySQL, S3, RabbitMQ, Redis, Docker.

Team:

Now itÂ isÂ 1Â Tech Lead onÂ the client side and 2Â full-stack engineers from SPD. Later the team can beÂ merged with another team onÂ the same product. There are aÂ few other bigger teams, 1Â inÂ theÂ US and 3Â inÂ India.

Team processes:

Scrum

Work schedule:

flexible, can beÂ shifted toÂ late hours ifÂ itâ€™s CentralÂ EU (for example from 11-12:00 till 20-21:00).

Weâ€™re looking for you ifÂ you have:

  • 4+Â years ofÂ professional experience inÂ software development;
  • Commercial experience working with aÂ large codebase and big number ofÂ microservices, ability toÂ analyze and learn existing code and business logic fast;
  • Proven solid experience with Python, Django/Django REST frameworks;
  • Strong experience with SQL and NoSQLÂ databases, including Django ORM;
  • Good working understanding ofÂ Docker;
  • Required: Upper-intermediate English (B2Â and above), fluent Ukrainian (spoken and written).

Would beÂ aÂ plus:

  • Commercial hands-on experience with JS/React;
  • Commercial hands-on experience with AWS S3, RabbitMQ, Redis, Memcached, ELK stack;
  • E-commerce experience (orders, transactions, payments, fulfillment, inventory, taxes, etc.).

Sounds like you? Here are some ofÂ what youâ€™ll beÂ doing:

  • Building business logic for eGift-card white-label shop;
  • Creation ofÂ aÂ new microservice for internal assets management;
  • Implement new features, making existing code better, investigate issues inÂ production;
  • Writing unit tests;
  • Participating inÂ design and code reviews, planning meetings;
  • Communicate effectively with teammates, other teams, business representatives.

Whatâ€™s inÂ itÂ for You

Reveal great tech solutions

Join the team ofÂ experts who create custom, cutting-edge tech solutions for world-renowned businesses, fueling client growth. Unleash your potential, tackle new challenges, and beÂ part ofÂ aÂ team that values your skills and contributions. Focus onÂ long-term impact and building tailored, long-lasting partnerships with our clients.

Experience anÂ agile and flexible working environment

Enjoy the freedom ofÂ fully remote work with aÂ flexible working schedule. Empower yourself with aÂ stable workload and aÂ stable income, supported byÂ provided laptops and licensed software. WeÂ focus onÂ lasting cooperation and unite result-oriented individuals who stand onÂ aÂ high-performance approach toÂ work.

Embrace the opportunity for personal and professional growth

Benefit from performance and merit reviews, elevate your skills with personal development plans, and individual learning through the corporate library, public speaking support, and more.

BeÂ among like-minded people

Work with aÂ team ofÂ one mind who cares about what they doÂ and how theyÂ do. Collaborate with top-notch experts who are always ready toÂ help and support you through any challenges. Join company-wide tech and cultural events, and contribute toÂ meaningful CSR initiatives that resonate with your values. Feel supported byÂ yourÂ HR, and take advantage ofÂ our referral bonus program.

Interview steps

  1. Pre-screen with the recruiter;
  2. Managers Interview;
  3. Technical interview;
  4. Client Interview.

Embrace the opportunity toÂ innovate withÂ us!
title: Python/Django Full-Stack Engineer

description:
Over 20Â years ofÂ market experience, Intellias brings together technologists, creators and innovators inÂ Europe, North and Latin America, and the Middle East. Join our international team and take the mission toÂ solve the advanced tech challenges ofÂ tomorrow!

What project weÂ have for you

Our client isÂ aÂ fast-growing startup that isÂ onÂ aÂ mission toÂ change the deskless work experience. They created aÂ management platform that allows toÂ easily manage all operations, from scheduling toÂ payroll. With over 3.8B deskless workers across the globe, the challenges and potential are endless. Product includes various features: scheduling and time tracking, task management, communication management, chat, knowledge base, help desk, HRÂ &Â people management, recognition &Â rewards, documentation, training etc.

WeÂ are looking for anÂ experienced Senior Product Fullstack Developer, toÂ further develop the management platform. You will build aÂ product that customers love and use onÂ aÂ daily basis, aÂ product that isÂ fun toÂ use, fast, reliable and scalable. You will tackle aÂ wide array ofÂ problems from developing aÂ UI that isÂ responsive toÂ the user and fun toÂ choosing the right backend technologies toÂ solve specific product use cases atÂ scale.

What you need for this

  • 5+Â years ofÂ experience working with frontend and backend technologies atÂ scale.
  • 5+Â years ofÂ experience with Python
  • 3+Â years ofÂ experience with React with MobX
  • Experience inÂ aÂ wide variety ofÂ technical tools such asÂ differentÂ DB types, queues, design patterns, and architectures.
  • Mongodb, MysqlÂ â€” Expert level
  • Message broker: Rabbit MQÂ â€” Expert level
  • Experience both with AWS and Azure isÂ needed
  • Ability toÂ understand the pros and cons ofÂ different architecture decisions and choose the best option.
  • Experience scaling services toÂ millions ofÂ users.
  • Understands the complexity ofÂ web technology, constraints, UI/UX.
  • Experience with State Management libraries (mobx, redux)

What itâ€™s like toÂ work atÂ Intellias

AtÂ Intellias, weÂ are committed toÂ being anÂ equal opportunity employer, fostering equity, diversity, and inclusion. WeÂ welcome and celebrate the differences ofÂ all qualified applicants. Join Intellias for aÂ career where your unique perspectives are not only valued but crucial toÂ our success.

title: Python (Flask) Developer

description:
WeÂ are seeking aÂ talented Middle Fullstack (Python + React) Engineer toÂ join our dynamic team.

What isÂ this project about?

This isÂ aÂ Fintech project from theÂ US, whose main goal isÂ toÂ manage and schedule debts forÂ US customers using aÂ popular payment system. The digital collection strategy allows clients toÂ pay atÂ their own pace onÂ aÂ customizable plan that works for them.

The customers have aÂ proprietary online portal toÂ manage their accounts. The platform offers them multiple installment payment options, nearly instant account updates, and even potential discounts for many accounts.

InÂ the last two years, the client has successfully found their product-market fit, which means theyâ€™ve now identified their target customers and are set for further growth. Their recent decision toÂ expand the team byÂ adding two more engineers isÂ aÂ solid indicator ofÂ confidence inÂ the future ofÂ their business. Additionally, the client prefers long-term relationships with team members, rarely making changes, which reflects their focus onÂ building aÂ strong, lasting team dynamic.

About the company and project:

ZONE3000Â is proud toÂ represent its partnership with Namecheap (www.namecheap.com). Namecheap was founded inÂ 2000Â on the idea that all people deserve value-priced domains delivered through stellar service. Today Namecheap isÂ aÂ leading ICANN-accredited domain name registrar and web hosting company with over 13Â million customers and 17Â million domains under managementÂ â€” and weâ€™re just getting started.

Our culture isÂ built onÂ the values that weÂ live every day: the way weÂ work, the way weÂ collaborate with our global network ofÂ colleagues and the way weÂ relentlessly innovate solutions that meet the emerging needs ofÂ our customers.

AtÂ Namecheap, weÂ are looking for aÂ dynamic and experienced Technical Leader with aÂ strong background inÂ BIÂ / MLÂ and Python toÂ spearhead our newly established Intelligence Integration Team (IIT). This team isÂ set toÂ play aÂ pivotal role within our organization, developing both existing and new microservices and infrastructure toÂ integrate the capabilities generated byÂ ourÂ BI business unit seamlessly. This integration spans various domains ofÂ business intelligence and machine learning, facilitating aÂ crucial connection between raw BIÂ & MLÂ outputs and their application across the organization. This includes interfacing with technical teams, asÂ well asÂ supporting business operations such asÂ product development, customer support, and executive decision-making. The IIT isÂ tasked with adhering toÂ and promoting the general architecture and technical standards asÂ defined byÂ the Technology Business Unit ofÂ Namecheap.

Celebrating over 23Â years ofÂ excellence, Namecheap stands asÂ aÂ leading technology firm, excelling inÂ domain registration, web hosting, and many internet services. With our roots deeply embedded inÂ the ethos ofÂ security, privacy, and reliability, weÂ have become the 2nd largest domain registry globally. Our missionÂ â€” toÂ democratize access toÂ domains and empower individuals and businesses toÂ leverage the full potential ofÂ the webÂ â€” isÂ what propelsÂ us forward. AsÂ innovators, weÂ continuously push the envelope inÂ online presence management, ensuring ease ofÂ access and affordability for establishing aÂ digital identity. ByÂ joiningÂ us, you become anÂ integral part ofÂ aÂ forward-thinking team committed toÂ keeping the Internet open and accessible for all.

Our endeavors also include the launch ofÂ Spaceship.com , aÂ novel reimagination ofÂ domain registrar and online services. AsÂ aÂ Technical Leader, you will contribute toÂ Namecheap and Spaceship, driving innovation and excellence.

Our organization leverages advanced Business Intelligence (BI) systems toÂ process approximately 100GB ofÂ data daily, with internal storage exceeding 100TB across various data types. WeÂ currently have 25Â models deployed inÂ production, with aÂ total ofÂ 35Â machine learning models under development and testing. These models, which weÂ update and expand atÂ aÂ rate ofÂ 1-2 every 2-3 months, aim for aÂ benchmark accuracy ofÂ 96-97%. Our data processing infrastructure utilizes aÂ wide range ofÂ sources, including hundreds ofÂ databases, APIs, and crawlers, and operates with aÂ standard one-day latency for business metrics calculations while supporting real-time KPIs. Serving anÂ internal user base ofÂ over 2000Â employees, weÂ handle approximately 10-15 requests daily, with 200 personalized licenses for dailyÂ BI tool usage. Model updates are scheduled according toÂ business needs and can vary from daily toÂ quarterly, ensuring continuous improvement inÂ our operations.st amounts ofÂ data and complex machine learning models, optimizing the flow ofÂ business insights and decision-making processes across the organization. title: Senior Python Developer

description:

AsÂ aÂ Python Developer, you will beÂ aÂ key part ofÂ the Clientâ€™s AIÂ team, helping toÂ design and build solutions that make legal collaboration seamless and accessible for everyone. Youâ€™ll work onÂ aÂ platform that leverages natural language processing (NLP) and other modernÂ AI techniques toÂ improve legal workflows. This isÂ aÂ unique opportunity for someone with aÂ passion for Python and digital platforms who wants toÂ innovate inÂ the legal domain.

Key Responsibilities:
â€”Â Develop and maintain Python-based back-end systems for the Shareforce platform

â€”Â Work with cloud providers like AWS and Google Cloud toÂ optimize deployment
â€”Â Collaborate with the front-end and DevOps teams toÂ ensure seamless integration
â€”Â Contribute toÂ the platformâ€™s overall architecture, ensuring scalability and performance
â€”Â Stay updated with the latest Python libraries and frameworks toÂ continually enhance the platform
â€”Â Help standardize development processes and contribute toÂ the evolution ofÂ theÂ AI system

Key Qualifications:
â€”Â AtÂ least 3+Â years ofÂ relevant experience inÂ Python development

Will beÂ aÂ plus:

Project Description
Client isÂ aÂ platform for legal professionals toÂ collaborate onÂ legal documents.
The Client isÂ transforming the legal sector byÂ building anÂ innovative collaboration platform for legal documents, much like GitLab/GitHub for legal professionals. The first version ofÂ the platform has already been successfully launched and isÂ inÂ use byÂ clients. With real user data now comingÂ in, the company isÂ set toÂ take the platform toÂ the next level.

title: Middle Python developer

description:
AtÂ Preply, weÂ are unlocking human potential through learning.

WeÂ believe learning with aÂ great tutor isÂ life-changing. Thatâ€™s why weÂ match online tutors from across the globe with learners and empower them toÂ create live language classes with AI-powered tools and learning materials. This isÂ how weÂ deliver progress, create engagement and keep our global community ofÂ learners motivated. SoÂ far, over 32,000 tutors have given more than 15Â million lessons toÂ learners from over 175Â countries.

The Preply Engineering Team provides the tools toÂ help unlock human potential through learning.

Our team leverages the powerful combination ofÂ Python/Django and ReactJS toÂ engineer scalable, resilient applications that provide our users with anÂ exceptional and seamless experience. WeÂ implement A/B tests toÂ prove the value ofÂ our initiatives and improve our product based onÂ data and user feedback. AsÂ part ofÂ our commitment toÂ ensuring high-quality products, weÂ prioritize monitoring and metrics analysis toÂ identify areas for optimization and ensure our services are performing atÂ their best. Our team isÂ made upÂ ofÂ talented engineers who are passionate about solving complex problems and developing innovative solutions toÂ drive our companyâ€™s success.

AtÂ Preply, weÂ release our product 50-60 times per day byÂ leveraging top-notch CI/CDÂ processes. AsÂ aÂ fast-growing company, weÂ have diverse technical challenges (sometimes weÂ even write about them onÂ our Engineering Blog) that will allow you toÂ develop your skills atÂ scale.

Meet the team!

AtÂ Preply, youâ€™ll beÂ crafting the initial steps learners and tutor take into their adventures into Preply. WeÂ create solutions that makes itÂ easier for students toÂ find aÂ tutor that isÂ perfect for them.

AsÂ aÂ software engineer onÂ our team, youâ€™ll beÂ atÂ the forefront ofÂ shaping life-changing educational journeys. Youâ€™ll beÂ crafting the critical first steps that learners and tutors take asÂ they embark onÂ their Preply adventure. This isÂ about opening doors toÂ global connections and transformative learning experiences.

You will beÂ working inÂ aÂ cross-functional Growth team alongside 5Â other engineers, Product Manager, Tech Lead, Data Analytics and Engineering Manager toÂ deliver the best first experience toÂ our users (upper funnel).

What youâ€™ll beÂ doing:

  • Collaborate with fellow software engineers, product managers, designers, UXÂ writers, and data analysts.
  • Think beyond the code and about our customers, understand their needs and define solutions with the team;
  • Develop frontend features inÂ React/Typescript, launched inÂ our A/B experimentation framework.
  • Develop new backend features inÂ Python/Django asÂ well asÂ design, create, and/or troubleshoot integrations with third-party vendors.
  • Align your work with our quality practices byÂ writing end-to-end tests, configuring monitoring and alerting, and addressing technical debt.
  • HelpÂ us make our best practices even better (test culture, code reviews, mentoring).

For additional information, check out our Engineering Tech Radar.

What you need toÂ succeed:

  • â€œProduct Engineeringâ€ mindset.
  • 3+Â years overall software development experience with well-rounded Full Stack engineering skills.
  • Experience developing backend services with Python.
  • Exposure toÂ front-end technologies, such asÂ React, Typescript, JavaScript, HTML/5, and CSS3.
  • Exposure toÂ architectural patterns ofÂ aÂ large, high-scale web application (e.g., well-designed APIs, high-volume data pipelines, efficient algorithms).
  • Experience mentoring team members and leading technical projects.
  • Adept atÂ balancing multiple stakeholder interests while ensuring project excellence.
  • Bring your voice and ideas toÂ the team, thinking beyond the code and about our customers.

Why youâ€™ll love itÂ atÂ Preply:

  • AnÂ open, collaborative, dynamic and diverse culture;
  • AÂ generous monthly allowance for lessons onÂ Preply.com, Learning &Â Development budget and time off for your self-development;
  • AÂ competitive financial package with equity, leave allowance and access toÂ free mental health support platforms;
  • The opportunity toÂ unlock the potential ofÂ learners and tutors through language learning and teaching inÂ 175 countries (and counting!).

Our Principles

  • Care toÂ change the worldÂ â€” WeÂ are passionate about our work and care deeply about its impact toÂ beÂ life changing.
  • WeÂ doÂ itÂ for learnersÂ â€” For both Preply and tutors, learners are why weÂ doÂ what weÂ do. Every day weÂ focus onÂ empowering tutors toÂ deliver anÂ exceptional learning experience.
  • Keep perfectingÂ â€” ToÂ create anÂ outstanding customer experience, weÂ focus onÂ simplicity, smoothness, and enjoyment, continually perfecting itÂ asÂ every detail matters.
  • Now isÂ the timeÂ â€” InÂ aÂ fast-paced world, itÂ matters how quickly weÂ act. Now isÂ the time toÂ make great things happen.
  • Disciplined executionÂ â€” What makesÂ us disciplined isÂ the excellence inÂ our execution. WeÂ set clear goals, focus onÂ what matters, and utilize our resources efficiently.
  • Dive deepÂ â€” WeÂ leverage business acumen and curiosity toÂ investigate disparities between numbers and stories, unlocking meaningful insights toÂ guide our decisions.
  • Growth mindsetÂ â€” WeÂ proactively seek growth opportunities and believe todayâ€™s best performance becomes tomorrowâ€™s starting point. WeÂ humbly embrace feedback and learn from setbacks.
  • Raise the barÂ â€” WeÂ raise our performance standards continuously, alongside each new hire and promotion. WeÂ build diverse and high-performing teams that can make aÂ real difference.
  • Challenge, disagree and commitÂ â€” WeÂ value open and candid communication, even when weÂ donâ€™t fully agree. WeÂ speak our minds, challenge when necessary, and fully commit toÂ decisions once made.
  • One PreplyÂ â€” WeÂ prioritize collaboration, inclusion, and the success ofÂ our team over personal ambitions. Together, weÂ support and celebrate each otherâ€™s progress.

Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion

Preply isÂ committed toÂ creating aÂ diverse and inclusive environment where people from all backgrounds can thrive. Different opinions and viewpoints are key ingredients inÂ our success asÂ aÂ multicultural Ed-Tech company.

Preply will consider all applications for employment without regard toÂ race, color, religion, gender identity orÂ expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age orÂ veteran status. Together, weÂ are The World Class.

title: Middle Machine Learning Engineer

description:
Company Description:

AtÂ Ceres, weâ€™re building the worldâ€™s most advanced data analytics platform for agriculture. WeÂ believe the future ofÂ agriculture depends onÂ building the right tools toÂ help farmers, insurers, lenders, and sustainability partners make the most ofÂ their limited resources. WeÂ are aÂ science-driven organization with aÂ vision ofÂ sustainable agriculture that works for farmers.

The Role:

WeÂ are seeking aÂ backend engineer with 3+Â years ofÂ software engineering experience who can helpÂ us maintain and build internal tooling for our global team ofÂ GIS analysts that allowsÂ us toÂ scale our existing business and integrate new products into the product delivery pipeline. AsÂ aÂ member ofÂ our team, youâ€™ll:

  • Work closely with our analysts toÂ understand and implement their requested changes toÂ existing geospatial workflows/pipelines
  • Identify opportunities toÂ streamline processes and make them faster and more scalable
  • Cooperate with other engineers toÂ ensure that youâ€™re implementing tools that will function well within aÂ complex and integrated environment ofÂ automated data processing pipelines, human-in-the-loop imagery processing, and all the necessary data management tools that enableÂ us toÂ acquire and process tens ofÂ thousands ofÂ acres ofÂ aerial imagery each day
  • Collaborate with our scientists toÂ help bring their proof-of-concept analyses toÂ life byÂ fully operationalizing them and ensuring weÂ can deliver atÂ scale
  • Monitor and troubleshoot processing issues
  • Write clean, readable, code that isÂ maintainable over time

Skills:

Required Skills

  • Strong knowledge ofÂ Python
  • Proficiency with backend frameworks (Django preferred)
  • Proficiency inÂ front-end technologies, particularly React
  • Strong communication skillsÂ â€” youâ€™ll beÂ collaborating with aÂ variety ofÂ teams with differing technical backgrounds
  • English language competency

Nice toÂ Have

  • Familiarity with geospatial tools (QGIS, python-based raster processing libraries such asÂ rasterio and geopandas)
  • Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud)

Employee benefits:

  • Flexible schedule: 8-hour work day with opportunity toÂ work remotely
  • Comfortable office within walking distance ofÂ aÂ metro station
  • Work closely with anÂ international team
  • Registration inÂ the format within DiiaCity (Gig-contract)
  • Free health insurance after aÂ probationary period
title: Senior Backend Engineer

description:
WeÂ are anÂ IT services company based out ofÂ San Francisco, USA. â€‹â€‹We build and acquihire expert engineering and data science teams toÂ help our clients meet their business needs and solve their operational challenges.

WeÂ are looking for aÂ talented Senior Software Engineer with anÂ interest inÂ building agentic applications using large language models (LLMs). InÂ this role, you will beÂ joining aÂ team ofÂ engineers tasked with empowering local businesses byÂ creatingÂ AI agents that efficiently handle customer interactions toÂ optimize operations and reclaim valuable time. IfÂ you are passionate about tackling complex challenges, thrive inÂ aÂ fast-paced, iterative environment, and have aÂ knack for breaking down intricate problems, weÂ think youâ€™ll beÂ aÂ great fit.


What you will beÂ doing:

  • Develop and deploy advanced agentic applications powered byÂ large language models toÂ help local businesses automate interactions and manage leads.
  • Drive the entire lifecycle ofÂ AI agent development, from conception and design toÂ implementation and maintenance.
  • Engage inÂ rapid prototyping and iterative development toÂ refineÂ AI solutions based onÂ real-world performance and feedback.
  • Implement monitoring and evaluation systems toÂ track the effectiveness ofÂ AI agents inÂ production, ensuring high reliability and user satisfaction.
  • Contribute toÂ aÂ culture ofÂ innovation byÂ staying current with industry trends inÂ generativeÂ AI and applying cutting-edge research toÂ practical business solutions.


What you should have:

  • 5+Â years ofÂ hands-on programming experience with atÂ least one modern language such asÂ Python, Go, orÂ Elixir.
  • Hand-on experience training, fine-tuning, and/or deploying LLM applications inÂ production environments.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with aÂ proven ability toÂ decompose complex issues and drive innovation inÂ aÂ highly iterative development process.
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability toÂ work effectively inÂ aÂ team setting.
  • Ability toÂ solve ambiguous problems and thrive inÂ aÂ fast-paced environment.
title: Senior Python Engineer

description:
Aesthetics 360Â is aÂ pioneering startup inÂ the aesthetics industry, dedicated toÂ connecting patients with top-tier providers through innovative technology. Our platform enhances patient education, supports marketing efforts, and streamlines processes like scheduling and consultations.

WeÂ are seeking aÂ highly skilled and experienced Senior Python Developer toÂ join our innovative team inÂ building aÂ core backend application for aÂ groundbreaking MedTech startup. AsÂ aÂ key member ofÂ our development team, you will play aÂ crucial role inÂ architecting and developing aÂ cutting-edge application from the groundÂ up.

â€¢ Develop, test, and maintain high-quality software using Python.

â€¢ Design and implement APIs using FastAPI.

â€¢ Work with Pydantic for data validation and serialization.

â€¢ Use SQLAlchemy for ORM and database interactions.

â€¢ Manage PostgreSQL databases effectively.

â€¢ Develop and deploy serverless applications.

â€¢ Design, implement, and manage AWS-based cloud infrastructure.

â€¢ Implement infrastructure asÂ code using tools like Terraform orÂ CloudFormation.

â€¢ Monitor and optimize system performance and costs inÂ AWS environments.

â€¢ Collaborate with cross-functional teams toÂ define, design, and ship new features.

Requirements:

â€¢ Strong experience with Python and related frameworks

â€¢ Proficiency inÂ PostgreSQL and database management.

â€¢ Experience with AWS services, including Lambda, Cognito, ECS, APIÂ Gateway, Fargate, RDS, EC2, S3, and CloudWatch.

â€¢ Experience with serverless architecture and microservices.

â€¢ Solid understanding ofÂ infrastructure asÂ code principles and tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).

â€¢ Proficiency inÂ containerization technologies such asÂ Docker and container orchestration with Kubernetes orÂ ECS.

description:

Job Description:

AsÂ aÂ Backend Developer, you will beÂ involved inÂ the development and maintenance ofÂ aÂ scalable, mission-critical, data-driven AWS cloud-based online service.

You will collaborate with senior-level development team members toÂ make technical architecture and design decisions. InÂ addition, you will take ownership ofÂ key components ofÂ the online service.

About the company:

Zoral isÂ aÂ fintech software research and development company. WeÂ were founded inÂ 2004.

WeÂ operate one ofÂ largest labs inÂ Europe focused onÂ Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML), predictive systems for consumer/SME credit and financial products.

Our clients are based inÂ USA, Canada, Europe, Africa, Asia, South America and Australia.

WeÂ are one ofÂ the worldâ€™s leading companies inÂ the use ofÂ unstructured, social, device, MNO, bureau and behavioral data, for real-time decisioning and predictive modeling.

Zoral software intelligently automates digital financial products.

Zoral produced the worldâ€™s first, fully automated, STP consumer credit platforms.

WeÂ are based inÂ London, New York and Berlin

description:
About Corva

Corva has built aÂ first-of-its-kind energy app store onÂ aÂ bedrock ofÂ best-in-class technologies, data pipelines, and aÂ secure and scalable architecture. Our energy solutions solve todayâ€™s toughest well delivery challenges, from well design through drillout. The ever-evolving platform isÂ not only future-proof for digitizing operations but isÂ your toolkit toÂ accelerate sustainability and energy transition goals. Our platform isÂ built for speed and reliability and delivers unmatched features and capabilities.

Corva isÂ powering worldwide innovation byÂ driving efficiency, productivity, and profitability with our innovative energy solutions.

Technology Stack

PythonÂ 3.9, Asyncio, Pytest, AWS(Lambda, SQS, S3), MongoDB, Redis, Kafka, Docker &Â k8s. (Go, TS, Java, Ruby, Node used inÂ other teams)

Responsibilities and Duties:

title: Senior Python Developer

description:
Weâ€™re opening the position ofÂ aÂ Senior Python Engineer toÂ extend the existing team ofÂ our Customers. They provide SaaS solutions that help companies toÂ optimize their businesses. These solutions include business planning and execution, processes automation and optimization.

The Customersâ€™ platform leverages industry-leading artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) for better predictions and prevention ofÂ disruptions across the businesses. Customers value our experience and want toÂ extend the team toÂ develop aÂ new functionality.

Responsibilities:

  • Work together with our Software Engineers, Architects, and Managers toÂ advance our Service-side product
  • Design and develop data-intensive distribution systems inÂ Python and modern cloud-based query engines like Snowflake
  • Leverage Microsoft Azure cloud service toÂ build aÂ scalable platform responsible for data ingestion
  • Write and maintain the functional tests for the product
  • Work inÂ anÂ Agile team with anÂ emphasis onÂ quality, testability, and delivery

Requirements:

  • In-depth knowledge ofÂ Python and databases
  • Experience with cloud environment like AWS orÂ Azure
  • Expertise with SaaS methodologies, Microservices inÂ particular
  • Good understanding and hands-on experience with Shell scripting
  • Understanding and/or hands-on experience with Kubernetes
  • Experience with CI/CD systems (preference will beÂ given toÂ GitHub Actions)

WeÂ offer:

  • Remote-first work model with flexible working hours (weÂ provide all equipment)
  • Comfortable and fully equipped offices inÂ Lviv and RzeszÃ³w
  • Competitive compensation with regular performance reviews
  • 18Â paid vacation days per year + all state holidays
  • 12Â days ofÂ paid sick leave per year without aÂ medical certificate + extra paid leave for blood donation
  • Medical insurance with anÂ affordable family coverage option
  • Mental health program which includes free and confidential consultations with aÂ psychologist
  • English and German language courses
  • Corporate subscription toÂ learning platforms, regular meetups and webinars
  • Friendly team that values accountability, innovation, teamwork, and customer satisfaction
  • Inclusive environment where everyone feels valued and treated equally. WeÂ proudly partner with VeteranHub toÂ support Ukrainian veterans
  • WeÂ are committed toÂ supporting Ukraine and actively participate inÂ charity initiatives
